title: CBC Life
text:
Looking for that special something to sweep your space into the new season? Instead of splurging on store-bought fare that you'll have to retire in a few weeks, why not make your own autumn accent in the form of these DIY paint-dipped paddles? Use any colour palette that strikes your fancy — or matches your existing decor — and play with patterns to create customized wall art that's truly one of a kind. Pup not included (sorry).

Paint Dipped Paddles 1:21

Here's what you need:

Wood paddles Sandpaper Ruler Pencil Painter's tape Acrylic paint (in colours of choice) Wood varnish

Here's how to do it:
description: Bring the lake vibes inside to enjoy year round
